code: import{Fragment,useState}from"react";import Box from"@material-ui/core/Box";import TextField from"@material-ui/core/TextField";import Paper from"@material-ui/core/Paper";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=_ref=>{let{title,description,setTitle,setDescription}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{mb:3},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Paper,{elevation:2,sx:{p:3,borderTop:"8px solid white"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{defaultValue:title,onBlur:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),variant:"standard",placeholder:"Tenant Ref",name:"title",sx:{mb:3},fullWidth:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{name:"description",defaultValue:description,onBlur:e=>setDescription(e.target.value),variant:"standard",placeholder:"Form Description",fullWidth:true,sx:{mb:2},multiline:true,rows:2})]})})});};export default Header;
